TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed Globals extends System.Object

summary.span: 模块包含脚本引擎函数。

span.span: The module contains script engine functions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此模块支持 Visual Basic 语言关键字和运行库成员，这些关键字提供有关当前使用的运行时的信息。This module supports the Visual Basic language keywords and runtime library members that provide information about the runtime currently in use. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 `ScriptEngineMajorVersion` 属性和相关属性返回描述当前运行时信息的字符串：The following example uses the `ScriptEngineMajorVersion` property and related properties to return a string describing the current runtime information: ```vb Function getRuntimeInfo() As String Dim runtime As String = ScriptEngine & " Version " runtime &= CStr(ScriptEngineMajorVersion) & "." runtime &= CStr(ScriptEngineMinorVersion) & "." runtime &= CStr(ScriptEngineBuildVersion) ' Return the current runtime information. Return runtime End Function ```

related.span: Visual Basic 运行时库成员

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ScriptEngine As String
public: static property System::String ^ ScriptEngine { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个表示当前使用的运行时的 。

span.span: Returns a representing the runtime currently in use.

value.span: 表示当前使用的运行时的字符串。

span.span: A string representing the runtime currently in use.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ScriptEngine`属性返回字符串 "VB"。The `ScriptEngine` property returns the string "VB". `ScriptEngine`当应用程序作为独立程序、脚本或主机应用程序运行时，可以使用。You can use `ScriptEngine` when your application is running as a standalone program, in a script, or in a host application. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 `ScriptEngine` 属性和相关属性返回描述当前运行时信息的字符串：The following example uses the `ScriptEngine` property and related properties to return a string describing the current run-time information: [!code-vb[VbVbalrScriptEngineProperties#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrScriptEngineProperties/VB/Module1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ScriptEngineBuildVersion As Integer
public: static property int ScriptEngineBuildVersion { int get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个整数，它包含当前使用的运行时的内部版本号。

span.span: Returns an integer containing the build version number of the runtime currently in use.

value.span: 当前使用的运行时的内部版本号。

span.span: The build version number of the runtime currently in use.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回值直接对应于当前运行时的 DLL 中包含的版本信息。The returned value corresponds directly to the version information contained in the DLL for the current runtime. `ScriptEngineBuildVersion`当应用程序作为独立程序、脚本或主机应用程序运行时，可以使用。You can use `ScriptEngineBuildVersion` when your application is running as a standalone program, in a script, or in a host application. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 `ScriptEngineBuildVersion` 属性和相关属性返回描述当前运行时信息的字符串：The following example uses the `ScriptEngineBuildVersion` property and related properties to return a string describing the current run-time information: [!code-vb[VbVbalrScriptEngineProperties#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrScriptEngineProperties/VB/Module1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ScriptEngineMajorVersion As Integer
public: static property int ScriptEngineMajorVersion { int get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个整数，它包含当前使用的运行时的主要版本号。

span.span: Returns an integer containing the major version number of the runtime currently in use.

value.span: 当前使用的运行时的主版本号。

span.span: The major version number of the runtime currently in use.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回值直接对应于当前运行时的 DLL 中包含的版本信息。The returned value corresponds directly to the version information contained in the DLL for the current runtime. `ScriptEngineMajorVersion`当应用程序作为独立程序、脚本或主机应用程序运行时，可以使用。You can use `ScriptEngineMajorVersion` when your application is running as a standalone program, in a script, or in a host application. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 `ScriptEngineMajorVersion` 属性和相关属性返回描述当前运行时信息的字符串：The following example uses the `ScriptEngineMajorVersion` property and related properties to return a string describing the current run-time information: [!code-vb[VbVbalrScriptEngineProperties#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrScriptEngineProperties/VB/Module1.vb#1)]

span.span: Returns an integer containing the minor version number of the runtime currently in use.
